| HistoryText             = 
The '''Black Womb Project''' was a secret project funded by the United States Government and based at a nuclear facility in [[Alamogordo]], [[New Mexico (State)|New Mexico]]. It was created to research genetics and mutation. Both [[Brian Xavier (Earth-616)|Brian Xavier]] (father of [[Charles Xavier (Earth-616)|Charles Xavier]]) and [[Kurt Marko (Earth-616)|Kurt Marko]] (father of [[Cain Marko (Earth-616)|Cain Marko]]) were members of the Project and allowed its head, [[Nathaniel Essex (Earth-616)|Dr. Nathan Milbury]] (Mister Sinister) to perform experiments on their sons. The Project also experimented on thousands of mutant babies, including [[Mortimer Toynbee (Earth-616)|Toad (Mortimer Toynbee)]].
